SELECT FID, FTR_CDE, BLD_NAM, DBL_NAM, AAA_CDE, AAB_CDE, BJD_CDE, HJD_CDE, SAN_CDE, FAC_NUM, FAD_NUM, NRD_NAM, NFC_NUM, NFD_NUM, BLD_HIT FROM BML_BLDG_AS
BJD_CDE like '%' || #{BJD_CDE} || '%'
AND BLD_NAM like '%' || #{BLD_NAM} || '%'
ORDER BY BLD_NAM

SELECT DISTINCT FID, BJD_NAM, JIBUN FROM (SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROW_SEQ, L.BJD_NAM, A.PNU, A.JIBUN, A.FID FROM (SELECT FID, PNU, JIBUN FROM LP_PA_CBND A
SUBSTR(PNU, 1, 11) LIKE '%' || #{BJD_CDE} || '%'
AND SUBSTR(PNU, 12, 4) LIKE '%' || #{BONBUN} || '%'
AND SUBSTR(PNU, 16, 4) LIKE '%' || #{BOOBUN} || '%'
AND SUBSTR(PNU, 11, 1) LIKE '%' || #{SAN} || '%'
ORDER BY PNU ) A, CMT_LGAR_MA L WHERE SUBSTR(A.PNU, 1, 10) = L.BJD_CDE ) ORDER BY BJD_NAM, JIBUN

SELECT DISTINCT FID, BULD_NM, BULD_NM_DC, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, SIG_CD FROM TL_SPBD_BULD
AND SIG_CD = #{HJD_CD}
AND EMD_CD = SUBSTR(#{BJD_CD}, 6, 3)
AND BULD_NM LIKE '%' || #{BULD_NM} || '%'
ORDER BY BULD_NM
